name: Samuel CHAMPION
subtitle: CFO Italy at Veolia
experiences:
CFO of Veolia subsidiary in Spain (www.veolia.es), active in Energy (district heating networks, cogeneration plants, solar, energy services contracts for public and prive clients…), Waste (recycling and incineration…) and Water (wastewater concession, O&M of desalinization plant).

Member of Spain Executive Commitee supervising also Purchase Department and IT Department

Supervision and management of the financial function of Veolia in Spain (M&A, Financing & Treasury, Management Control, Reporting, Internal Control, Risk Management, Accounting Shared Service Center)

Deputy to the CFO for Spain and Mexico business unit (t/o around 350 M€) for all the financial matters (relationships with investors and banking partners, internal control, management control, reporting, follow-up of accounting shared service center, financial performance improvement ...).

Veolia's excellent hashtag#growth momentum continued in the third quarter of 2023, with our EBITDA up 7.7% compared to a year earlier over the first 9 months and EBIT up 14.2%. 📈 We owe this to our very strong fundamentals: 70% of our contracts are indexed to cost increases and our geographic footprint is highly diversified, with 40% of our sales outside of Europe, including $5 billion on a yearly basis in the United States. This makes us uniquely resilient to tough macroeconomic conditions, as shown by our strong commercial momentum, with our fresh $2 billion contract in Hong Kong being the latest example of it, together with a record order intake of €3.1 billion in water treatment technologies, in which we are the leader. On top of this, the integration of Suez keeps on delivering ahead of schedule, as we have reached our annual target on this front in just 9 months, a great sign of the value that the merger brings to our company and that we continue to manage all of our activities with rigor.We also owe our great results to the dedication of the whole Veolia team and the fact that our activity is deeply meaningful and needed as the demand for hashtag#EcologicalTransformation grows.All of these factors make me extremely confident in our future trajectory and allow me to fully confirm our targets for 2023. We have many more great things to accomplish in the months and years ahead!🔗 https://lnkd.in/ei7dQCFs

Nel percorso verso la hashtag#transizioneecologica, il principio "hashtag#EnergyEfficiency First” può giocare un ruolo centrale: la prima leva è ridurre il consumo, per rendere più facile e compatibile l’integrazione delle fonti hashtag#rinnovabili.In parallelo, per l’Italia sarà importante puntare sulla sostituzione di impianti obsoleti e introdurre tecnologie nuove, come la cogenerazione e la trigenerazione.Ne ho parlato con Giuliana Ferraino sul Corriere della Sera della Sera e con Simone Cerroni su Class CNBC a margine del forum The European House-Ambrosetti House-Ambrosetti a Cernobbio

This first semester, Veolia has proved once again that it is in great shape. With revenue up +14.2% and current net income up +18.7%, we delivered excellent results showing not only strong momentum, but also the unmatched strength of our value proposition.Even against a challenging macroeconomic backdrop, we continued to deliver crucial value to our clients as the demand for hashtag#EcologicalTransformation grows more and more urgent. To me, the best proof of this lies in the many long-term contracts we have won since the beginning of the year to help the world’s leading cities and companies cope with water scarcity, better manage even the most complex kinds of waste, and find alternative sources of energy. These contracts will contribute to our dynamism for many years.Meanwhile, the merger with Suez has surpassed expectations, with 230 million euros of synergies generated already, well ahead of schedule, and our global footprint is getting more and more diversified.More than ever, Veolia is at the forefront of the world’s toughest environmental challenges, and our team’s expertise simply has no equivalent anywhere else. Our ideal positioning and exceptional team put the group on a sustainable growth trajectory that makes me very confident for the future!
